text: Jila Almasi (; born 15 July 1954) is an Iranian fencer. She competed in the women's individual and team foil events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Iran Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Fencers at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1974 Asian Games
title: Jila Almasi
